ITP 226 - Fibre Optic Cabling
Tag 1: itp 226 - fibre optic cabling

Name: Coordination
Tag 1: coordination

Name: Attach marked up drawing
Tag 1: please attach marked up drawing - please take photo of title block

Name: All new installations are coordinated with other services
Tag 1: ensure that all new installations have been coordinated with other services, both new and existing

Name: Pit & underground piping are clear of obstructions
Tag 1: ensure pit and underground piping are clear of obstructions and have the appropriate access and barricading

Name: All new installations numbering & labelling systems meet specification
Tag 1: ensure that all new installations numbering and labelling systems meet specification and have been approved by the client

Name: Prior to installation submit numbered Communications shop drawings for review
Tag 1: prior to installation submit numbered communications shop drawings for review to the satisfaction of services engineer

Name: Cable Installation
Tag 1: cable installation

Name: Latest services & coordinated drawings are being referenced
Tag 1: ensure that the latest services and coordinated drawings are being referenced

Name: Cable does need exceed manufactures bending radius as per AS S2009:2013
Tag 1: ensure the cable does need exceed manufactures bending radius and is segregated to other services as per as s2009:2013

Name: Cable pulling strength is not exceeded as per manufacturer's recommendations
Tag 1: ensure the cable pulling strength is not exceeded as per manufacturer's recommendations

Name: Cable loomed in neatly along cable pathway
Tag 1: ensure the cable been loomed in neatly along cable pathway and has adequate service loop's at both origin and destination

Name: Termination
Tag 1: termination

Name: Area for splicing has appropriate workstation
Tag 1: ensure the area for splicing has the appropriate workstation and is in a dust free environment

Name: Cut the last 2 meters of fibre & remove it to avoid any dirt, or damage
Tag 1: cut the last 2 meters of the fibre and remove it to avoid any dirt, or damage from the hauling that may have taken place.

Name: Cable is stripped using the specialised tools & remove all Gel using telstra wipes
Tag 1: ensure the cable is stripped using the specialised tools and remove all gel using telstra wipes if applicable and secure kevlar rope

Name: All equipment are visually inspected, self checked, cleaned and regular serviced
Tag 1: ensure all equipment (cleaver and splicer) has been visually inspected, self checked, cleaned and regular servicing has been maintained

Name: All splicing follows the correct sequence &cut off shards are accounted
Tag 1: ensure all splicing follows the correct sequence and any cut off shards are accounted for and disposed of correctly

Name: Fobot is securely placed inside enclosure & dust caps installed
Tag 1: ensure fobot is securely placed inside enclosure and dust caps installed

Name: Testing
Tag 1: testing

Name: OTDR Testing is taken from both directions & at multiple wavelengths
Tag 1: ensure that otdr testing is taken from both directions and at multiple wavelengths and all results are recorded with their core/cable no as per label on cabinet and latest revision drawings

Name: Light Source Testing has correct parameters as per manufacturer & client requirements
Tag 1: ensure that light source testing has the correct parameters as per manufacturer and client requirements all results are recorded with their core/cable no as per label on cabinet and latest revision drawings

Name: Test Results Recording
Tag 1: test results recording

Name: All test results are downloaded and stored
Tag 1: ensure all test results are downloaded and stored in both their native format and as pdf's or safe keeping

Name: Final Inspection
Tag 1: final inspection

Name: All changes made to the original drawing are marked and noted on the Working Drawing located
Tag 1: ensure that all changes made to the original drawing have been marked and noted on the working drawing located in the site office. these drawings must be kept updated for use as as built drawings.

Name: Cross check & verify that as built drawings are complete &correct
Tag 1: cross check and verify that the as built drawings are complete and correct

Name: Verify all testing are complete & collate records
Tag 1: verify all testing are complete and collate records
